body: <div data-popover id="context-${1:number}" role="tooltip" class="absolute z-10 invisible inline-block w-64 p-4 text-center text-white transition-opacity duration-300 bg-blue-700 rounded-lg shadow-sm opacity-0">

<div data-popover id="textual-${1:number}" role="tooltip" class="absolute z-10 invisible inline-block w-64 p-4 text-center text-white transition-opacity duration-300 bg-green-600 rounded-lg shadow-sm opacity-0">
